scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a spiral sketchbook converted into a recipe book. The volume includes clipped, printed, and handwritten recipes, as well clippings pictures of food and hand drawn sample table. Recipe are attributed to various sources, including a Betty Holmes, "Margie," Marion Dauber, Dolly Sweet, and Lester V. Some of the recipes are stapled into the book while others are pasted in.
